name: metabase
description: Metabase is an open-source data exploration and BI tool that lets users build dashboards and run queries without SQL. It supports self-hosted and cloud deployments, with a clean, intuitive UI and permission-based access.
features: Visual query builder: Create database queries using a point-and-click interface without writing SQL.
Dashboard creation: Build interactive dashboards with charts, tables, and visualizations.
SQL editor: Write custom SQL queries with syntax highlighting and auto-completion for advanced users.
Database connections: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and dozens of other data sources.
Scheduled reports: Automatically generate and email reports on a recurring schedule.
Data visualization: Create bar charts, line graphs, pie charts, maps, and other visual representations.
Drill-down analysis: Click through visualizations to explore underlying data in detail.
User permissions: Control access to databases, tables, and dashboards with role-based permissions.
Embedding: Embed dashboards and charts in external applications or websites.
Alert system: Set up alerts that trigger when data meets specific conditions.
Mobile responsive: View and interact with dashboards from mobile devices.
API access: Programmatically query data and manage resources through REST API.
